directions: Whisk first 5 ingredients in small bowl to blend. Season with salt and pepper.
Place remaining ingredients in large bowl. Toss salad with enough dressing to season to taste.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar or red wine vinegar
1 head butter lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
1 large head radicchio, torn into bite-size pieces
2 oranges, peeled, sliced crosswise into rounds
title: Tricolor Salad with Honey-Cumin Dressing
